titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on standard grade ferroniobium.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 10/18/2007--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on standard grade ferroniobium.
